title: Gearty Grilling: The Noble Economist
itunes:author: Chris Pissarides
description: Contributor(s): Chris Pissarides | Chris Pissarides, Regius Professor of Economics and winner of a Nobel prize in 2010, discusses his ideas on how to run the economy.
